title: Chintz, 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants (black, 3 reds, 2 purples) applied by brush or pen (red over a resist). Blue applied by brush over resist. Yellow (now faded) applied by brush (chintz).
dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 79.5 x 44 cm (31 5/16 x 17 5/16 in.)
Repeat H (straight): 55.9 cm (22 in.)
description: Various flowers with trailing stems on a red ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Chintz, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants (black, 3 reds, 2 purples) applied by brush or pen (red over a resist). Blue applied by brush over resist. Yellow (now faded) applied by brush (chintz).. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1973-51-30.
